name: Tap My Plane
description:
Look, it's a bird, it's a plane, no it's superman...no wait, it is a plane. What is better than a bird flying through pipes? A plane flying through mountains, duh! Accept the challenge and put your skills to the test in this fun little game, let's see how far you get in your quest to reach your destination in one piece. Just tap and hold to ascend and release to descend. Try to get the plane as far as you can, Flappy Bird fans will love this game.

**Remember that you need to sign in a Google account in order to get leaderboards!!
